item.title: 未经测试的银行发现对高风险 AT1 债券的需求
item.description: 投资者急于购买风险最高的银行债务，甚至抢购未经证实的借款人的证券。【原文：Investors are so eager to buy the riskiest bank debt that they’re snatching up securities even from unproven borrowers.】

item.title: Meyer Burger 因两家公司申请破产而推迟发布财报
item.description: 陷入困境的太阳能模块制造商 Meyer Burger Technology AG 在其德国子公司申请破产程序后，要求延长提交 2024 年财务报告的最后期限。【原文：Struggling solar-module manufacturer Meyer Burger Technology AG requested an extension of the deadline to present its 2024 financial results after its German units filed for insolvency proceedings.】

item.title: 上午 10 点，股票期权飙升，散户交易员释放新机器人
item.description: 说起算法交易员，人们会联想到满屋子的数学博士，他们创建复杂的模型，在经济或盈利数据发布后的几毫秒内进行巨额交易。但现在，大批散户交易者开始转向自动交易，他们在地下室里建立的程序更像是华尔街银行的程序，而不是 Reddit 上的 r/wallstreetbets 线程。【原文：When people talk about algorithmic traders, it evokes images of rooms full of math PhDs creating complex models that place huge trades in milliseconds after economic or earnings data is released. But now, it’s retail traders who are turning in droves to automated trading, building the kind of programs in their basements more associated with Wall Street banks than the Reddit thread r/wallstreetbets.】

item.title: 数千人在保加利亚集会抗议采用欧元计划
item.description: 在保加利亚当局准备于明年初改用欧盟单一货币之际，成千上万的人聚集在保加利亚全国数十个城市，抗议采用欧元。【原文：Thousands of people gathered in dozens of cities across Bulgaria to protest against the adoption of the euro as authorities prepare to switch to the European Union’s single currency early next year.】

item.title: 阿达尼能源公司批准通过股票销售筹资 5.02 亿美元
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）控制的阿达尼能源解决方案有限公司（Adani Energy Solutions Ltd.）批准通过出售股权筹集 430 亿卢比（5.02 亿美元）。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani-controlled Adani Energy Solutions Ltd. approved raising 43 billion rupees ($502 million) via a stake sale.】

item.title: 投资于高空和海洋深处
item.description:
本期《华尔街周刊》将探讨美国空中交通管制的问题，并研究海底电缆如何传输全球互联网流量。【原文：

This Wall Street Week explores problems with US air traffic control and looks at how undersea cables transmit the world's internet traffic.

】

item.title: 开年狂飙后的股市现状
item.description: 2025 年前五个月股市的疯狂表现，让华尔街的专业人士们陷入了困境。【原文：The stock market’s crazy first five months of 2025 have left Wall Street pros in a bit of a pickle.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团概述重建孟买贫民窟的交通网络
item.description: 作为孟买达拉维重建项目的一部分，阿达尼集团计划建设一个交通网络，将铁路、公路和机场交通设施集中在一个地点。【原文：Adani Group plans to build a transportation network as part of the Dharavi redevelopment project in Mumbai that will house rail, road and airport transit facilities in a single location.】

item.title: 德国官员告诉 FAS：俄罗斯资产值得密切关注
item.description: 一位德国高级官员表示，欧盟应重新考虑如何将俄罗斯被冻结的数千亿欧元资产用于资助乌克兰的问题。【原文：The European Union should revisit the question of how hundreds of billions of euros in frozen Russian assets can be used to finance Ukraine, a top German official said.】

item.title: 稳定币监管可能动摇美国金融体系
item.description: 特朗普政府鼓吹放松管制是经济增长的源泉；其想法是，消除其所认为的企业桎梏将促进经济增长。但有时需要监管才能做到这一点。【原文：The Trump administration touts deregulation as a source of economic growth — the thinking is that removing what it sees as shackles on business will promote it. But sometimes it takes regulation to do that.】

item.title: 欧佩克+就第三次石油供应激增达成一致，油价跌势加剧
item.description: 欧佩克+"同意连续第三个月将石油日产量增加 411,000 桶，加倍推进这一历史性的政策转变，导致原油价格下挫。【原文：OPEC+ agreed to surge oil output by 411,000 barrels a day for the third month in a row, doubling down on a historic policy shift that has sent crude prices sinking.】

item.title: 泰国 1,150 亿美元预算案通过议会首轮审查
item.description: 泰国议会下院支持 3.78 万亿泰铢（约合 1,150 亿美元）的年度预算，总理白通丹-西那瓦领导的多党联盟为支持这一支出计划而消除了分歧。【原文：Thailand’s lower house of parliament backed a 3.78 trillion baht ($115 billion) annual budget as Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra’s multi-party coalition buried differences to support the spending plan.】

item.title: 比亚迪降价后，中国车企抨击 "恶性竞争
item.description: 几天前，比亚迪公司（BYD Co., Ltd.）的降价引发了市场对折扣战的担忧，这将进一步拖累电动汽车制造商的利润，中国汽车工业协会对 "恶性竞争 "发出警告。【原文：China’s automobile industry association warned against “vicious competition,” days after BYD Co.’s price cuts fueled market concerns of a discount war that would further weigh on profits of electric carmakers.】

item.title: 欧佩克+每日增加 41.1 万桶供应是主要方案
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+7 月份日供应量增加 41.1 万桶是周六会谈的主要方案。【原文：An OPEC+ supply increase of 411,000 barrels a day in July is the main scenario for talks on Saturday, delegates said.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：美国国内生产总值因贸易受冲击扩大而下降
item.description: 今年年初，美国经济略有萎缩，这在很大程度上反映出与关税相关的贸易冲击较大，但家庭支出增长的下行幅度也比最初估计的要大。【原文：The US economy contracted slightly to start the year, largely reflecting a bigger tariff-related trade hit but also a larger downshift in household spending growth than first estimated.】

item.title: 据 WiWo 报道，阿尔迪所有者正在就可能的合并进行谈判
item.description: 据《经济周刊》（WirtschaftsWoche）周六报道，德国阿尔迪折扣超市帝国（Aldi empire of discount supermarkets）部分企业背后的家族已就可能的合并举行了会谈。【原文：The families behind parts of Germany’s Aldi empire of discount supermarkets have held talks about a possible merger, WirtschaftsWoche reported on Saturday.】

item.description: 奇数：我们如何定义货币？播客【原文：Odd Lots: How Do We Define a Currency? (Podcast)】

item.title: 中国因禽流感病例禁止从巴西进口所有家禽
item.description: 在世界第一大出口国巴西发现禽流感疫情后，中国已禁止从巴西进口所有家禽产品，停止了价值超过 10 亿美元的贸易。【原文：China has banned imports of all poultry products from Brazil after a bird flu outbreak was detected in the world’s top exporter, halting a trade worth more than $1 billion.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员准备继续与被定罪的同事合作
item.description: 据熟悉欧洲中央银行决策者想法的人士透露，尽管彼得-卡齐米尔本周因贿赂罪被定罪，但他们准备继续与其同事合作。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers are prepared to keep working with their colleague Peter Kazimir despite his conviction for bribery this week, according to people familiar with their thinking.】

item.title: 菲律宾赌场运营商 Hann 提交 IPO 招股说明书，首席执行官表示
item.description: 菲律宾赌场运营商 Hann Holdings Inc. 首席执行官 Dae Sik Han 表示，该公司已提交首次公开募股的招股说明书。【原文：Philippine casino operator Hann Holdings Inc. has filed its prospectus for an initial public offering, Chief Executive Officer Dae Sik Han said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚称美国未就中国拥有的港口提出要求
item.description: 澳大利亚副总理表示，澳大利亚政府一贯反对中国拥有达尔文港，也没有受到特朗普政府的额外压力，要求为这个在堪培拉受到更严格审查的设施寻找新的买家。【原文：Australia’s deputy prime minister said the national government has consistently opposed Chinese ownership of the Port of Darwin and isn’t under added pressure from the Trump administration to find a new buyer for the facility that is under increased scrutiny in Canberra.】

item.title: 贸易战停战后中国工厂活动萎缩缓解
item.description: 尽管国内需求疲软继续拖累经济，但在与美国的关税战得到缓和、贸易流动得以疏通之后，中国 5 月份的工厂活动萎缩速度有所放缓。【原文：China’s factory activity contracted at a slower rate in May after a reprieve in the tariff war with the US unclogged trade flows, even as weak domestic demand continues to weigh on the economy.】

item.title: 中国企业上市热潮激发港股复兴希望
item.description: 中国公司的上市潮预计将重振香港的交易活动，越来越多的人乐观地认为，强劲的上市潮将推动更广泛的股市走高。【原文：A wave of listings by Chinese companies is expected to reinvigorate trading activity in Hong Kong, with optimism growing that a robust pipeline of debuts will drive the broader stock market higher.】

item.title: 美联储主席戴利表示对 2025 年两次降息仍无异议
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，她仍对美联储 3 月份发布的预测感到满意，该预测显示，美联储官员预计将在今年年底前降息两次。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said she was still comfortable with projections the Fed released in March showing officials expect to lower interest rates twice before the end of the year.】

item.title: TPG Angelo Gordon 是 Citgo 资产拍卖会的新竞标者之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，投资基金 TPG Angelo Gordon 是 Citgo Petroleum Corp. 母公司的新竞标者之一，这是法院监督拍卖的一部分，拍卖的目的是补偿资产被查封的委内瑞拉债权人。【原文：Investment fund TPG Angelo Gordon is among the new bidders for Citgo Petroleum Corp.’s parent company as part of a court-supervised auction designed to compensate creditors of Venezuela whose assets were seized, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会发出信号后，提供奖励的新一代加密货币基金呼之欲出
item.description: 新一代加密货币交易所交易基金允许投资者赚取收益—而不仅仅是押注价格—，它们有望在华尔街首次亮相。【原文：A new generation of crypto ETFs that allow investors to earn yield — not just bet on prices — looked poised for their Wall Street debut.】

item.title: 日本寻求增加对非洲的投资以缓解对中国的依赖
item.description: 日本正在支持其公司发展在非洲的业务，并在非洲大陆发展贸易关系，而在非洲，日本主要被视为一个重要的捐助国。【原文：Japan is supporting its companies to grow their business in Africa and develop trade ties across a continent where it’s mainly been seen as a key donor.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Chime 据称计划最快下周一上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Chime Financial Inc. 计划最快于下周一启动首次公开募股，因为在美国上市的公司将从 4 月份令人失望的表现中反弹。【原文：Chime Financial Inc. is planning to launch its initial public offering as soon as Monday, according to people familiar with the matter, as US listings bounce back from a disappointing April.】

item.title: 穆迪下调巴西评级展望，向卢拉发出财政警告
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将巴西的信用展望从正面下调至稳定，在巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）政府面临越来越大的财政压力之际，这是对其政府的责难。【原文：Moody’s Ratings lowered Brazil’s credit outlook to stable from positive, delivering a reproof to President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s government at a time when it is under increasing pressure to shore up the country’s fiscal situation.】
